__e: Tommy, I don't understand what you want.
I fought with you and for you, but... but Tommy, I...
Tommy, I will always be there for you, no matter what, but right now, I cannot be there for you because I have to go.
So, Tommy's been like this for the past two days, not wanting to go to school.
You know, Tommy's the only one who never ...
Now, the most important thing about this, Tommy, is you do not tell your mother.
What, you think Tommy had something to do with it?
She doesn't think Tommy had anything to do with the Guard.
I know he's your friend, but Tommy's been in the streets our entire lives.
One day me and Tommy will be on the same side again.
I know it's probably not easy for you to see Tommy and I together.
After all the pain that Tommy and I have caused...
They're friends. Look, I told them about Tommy and about the things that Tommy did to me.
But not a day goes by I don't think of them both.
I don't know where Tommy is, and I don't want to.

Tommy, this is way too much. I can't.

Okay, Tommy. You know what to do.
